name: Rubika Kumar
summary: Highly organized and detail-oriented professional with a proven track record in tracking and monitoring roles. I am adept at optimizing processes, maintaining accurate records, and delivering results within deadlines

experience.title: Associate engineer
responsibilities: CITI INDIA production support handles all the queries raised from customer end with the proper resolutions. The Ultimate goal of Production support is to handle and resolve customer queries where you have to undergo the complex situations and analyze the factors to close out the queries with proper resolutions within the SLA
Handles all the queries raised from customer end with the proper resolutions
Use ServiceNow to manage and track changes in the IT environment
Conducting CAM meetings with respective client and teams
Provided 24*7 operational supports to all production practices on holidays and weekends
On daily basis Checking on issues which are unresolved sending report to the respective team clinet project managers
Ensuring tickets are raised for repair and fix which has been taken for the reported issues and for user related queries which has been raised
Use insights gained from the reports to refine workflows, improve processes, and reduce the number of unresolved issues in the future
Review the reports, identify recurring issues or bottlenecks, and take necessary actions to address them. This might involve reassigning tasks, changing priorities, or allocating additional resources

experience.title: Trainee and Junior engineer
